world.description: The air within the Argent Manufacturing warehouse hangs thick with the scent of aged paper, dried lubricants, and a faint, metallic tang that speaks of dormant machinery. Towering shelves, some groaning under their immense weight, stretch upwards into the gloom, disappearing into an unseen ceiling far above. They are crammed with an untold number of cardboard boxes, their surfaces faded and brittle, each one a potential Pandora's Box of forgotten histories and unique artifacts. Dust motes dance in the beams of light that pierce the perpetual twilight, illuminating narrow aisles that wind like a maze through this silent monument to industry. The sheer scale of the place is overwhelming, a testament to the forgotten labors of those who once populated these echoing halls.

player.name: Silas
player.description: You are Silas, a scavenger of forgotten places, a connoisseur of curiosities. Your reputation precedes you in the hushed whispers of collectors and the dusty archives of antiquarians. You possess an uncanny knack for finding the extraordinary hidden within the mundane, a talent honed by years spent sifting through the remnants of bygone eras. Today, your pursuit of the peculiar has led you to the labyrinthine expanse of the old Argent Manufacturing warehouse, a place rumored to hold treasures beyond imagining, sealed away and undisturbed for decades.
player.appearanceDescription: You are a lone figure, clad in practical, oil-stained overalls that bear the marks of countless explorations. A well-worn leather tool belt hangs at your hip, its pouches bulging with an assortment of lock picks, a sturdy flashlight, and other implements of your trade. Your hands, calloused and strong, grip a flickering lantern, casting dancing shadows that only deepen the mystery of your surroundings.

Assembly Hall.name: Assembly Hall
Assembly Hall.description: You stand on the floor of the main Argent Manufacturing assembly hall. The sheer scale of the industrial machinery surrounding you is awe-inspiring, even in its dormant state. The air is thick with the accumulated detritus of decades, and the silence is profound, broken only by the subtle creaks of the aging structure.
Assembly Hall.appearanceDescription: The room is a cavernous space dominated by an immense, dormant assembly line. Thick chains hang limply from overhead gantries, coated in a fine layer of dust. Large, metallic components, their surfaces scarred and bearing the patina of age, are scattered across the grimy concrete floor. The air is still and heavy, carrying the scent of old oil and the faint whisper of ventilation systems that seem to have long since fallen silent.

Supervisor's Office.name: Supervisor's Office
Supervisor's Office.description: This appears to be a former supervisor's office. The confined space offers a stark contrast to the vastness of the warehouse. Papers strewn about suggest hurried departures or perhaps a meticulous, if now abandoned, record-keeping system.
Supervisor's Office.appearanceDescription: This cramped office is a relic of a bygone era. A heavy oak desk sits in the center, its surface littered with brittle papers and a rusted inkwell. A single, grimy window looks out onto the shadowy expanse of the warehouse floor. An old-fashioned rotary phone rests silently on a small side table, its coiled cord tangled.

Sorting Hub.name: Sorting Hub
Sorting Hub.description: This area seems to be a sorting and distribution hub. The various conveyor belts suggest a complex system designed for moving goods efficiently, though its current state of disrepair speaks volumes about its disuse.
Sorting Hub.appearanceDescription: The conveyor belt system here is a tangled mess of metal and rubber. Large, empty bins are stacked haphazardly along its sides, coated in a thick layer of grime. The machinery hums with a low, intermittent thrum, as if struggling to awaken from a long slumber.

Industrial Wrench.appearanceDescription: A heavy, cast-iron wrench lies on the concrete floor near the base of the assembly line. It is coated in a thick layer of grease and dust, its teeth worn smooth in places.
Industrial Wrench.description: This wrench looks like it's seen heavy use. It's a sturdy tool, capable of tightening or loosening large bolts, but its condition suggests it might be more of a historical artifact than a functional piece of equipment.
Industrial Wrench.name: Industrial Wrench

Control Lever.appearanceDescription: A tarnished brass lever protrudes from a control panel on the side of the dormant assembly line. It is currently in the 'off' position, its surface bearing the marks of countless hands.
Control Lever.description: This lever appears to be part of the machinery's control system. It seems sturdy but is currently inactive.
Control Lever.name: Control Lever

pickupable.reasonWhyNotPickup: The lever is firmly attached to the machinery and cannot be removed.

Metal Toolbox.appearanceDescription: A small, metal toolbox rests beside a stack of crates. It is made of dented steel and has a sturdy, if rusted, latch.

container.howToOpen: The latch on the toolbox appears to be stiff but functional.
container.howToStoreItem: You can place smaller items into the toolbox.

Metal Toolbox.description: This toolbox looks like it might contain some useful items for maintenance or repair. It is closed, and its contents are unknown.
Metal Toolbox.name: Metal Toolbox

Assembly Hall.description: A narrow, metal catwalk snakes from the far end of the assembly line towards a dimly lit doorway.
To your left, a wide, dust-covered conveyor belt stretches into the darkness, disappearing around a corner.

Supervisor's Office.description: The metal catwalk leads back into the main assembly hall, its grated surface a stark contrast to the solid concrete floor.

Sorting Hub.description: The conveyor belt returns you to the main assembly area, its rusted mechanism ominously still.

Metal Toolbox.appearanceDescription: A small, metal toolbox rests beside a stack of crates. It is made of dented steel and has a sturdy, if rusted, latch.

container.howToOpen: The latch on the toolbox appears to be stiff but functional.
container.howToStoreItem: You can place smaller items into the toolbox.

Metal Toolbox.description: This toolbox looks like it might contain some useful items for maintenance or repair. It is closed, and its contents are unknown.
Metal Toolbox.name: Metal Toolbox

Engineer's Logbook.appearanceDescription: A well-worn, leather-bound journal with pages filled with cramped, spidery handwriting and intricate diagrams of unknown mechanical devices. The cover is embossed with a stylized cogwheel, and a thin leather strap keeps it securely closed.

container.howToOpen: The journal is held shut by a leather strap which can be unbuckled.
container.howToStoreItem: Items can be carefully placed between the pages or tucked into the front cover.

Engineer's Logbook.description: This journal appears to be a personal log or a technical manual, filled with observations, calculations, and sketches related to complex machinery. Some entries seem to detail experiments with unusual energy sources, while others are simple daily entries, offering a glimpse into the life of a past engineer.
Engineer's Logbook.name: Engineer's Logbook

Assorted Fasteners.appearanceDescription: A collection of assorted screws, bolts, and washers, sorted loosely in a small, compartmentalized plastic tray. The metal components show varying degrees of rust and wear, hinting at their age and previous use.

container.howToOpen: The compartments are covered by a clear plastic lid that can be lifted.
container.howToStoreItem: Small metal components can be placed into any of the individual compartments.

Assorted Fasteners.description: This tray contains a variety of common fasteners, essential for any kind of repair or assembly. While seemingly mundane, the specific sizes and types might be crucial for interacting with certain machinery within the Argent Manufacturing warehouse.
Assorted Fasteners.name: Assorted Fasteners

Resonance Harmonizer.appearanceDescription: A peculiar, palm-sized device crafted from polished brass and inlaid with glowing blue chrysoprase. It hums softly when held, and a series of tiny, retractable copper antennae protrude from its surface.

container.howToOpen: The toolbox itself is made of dented steel and has a sturdy, if rusted, latch that needs to be manually lifted.
container.howToStoreItem: The device can be placed gently within the toolbox, ensuring its delicate antennae are not bent.

Resonance Harmonizer.description: This strange contraption feels warm to the touch and emits a faint, rhythmic pulse. Its purpose is unclear, but the glowing chrysoprase suggests it interacts with some form of ambient energy or signals. It might be a diagnostic tool, a communication device, or something far more esoteric.
Resonance Harmonizer.name: Resonance Harmonizer

Workman's Glove.appearanceDescription: A thick, canvas glove, stained with grease and oil, with reinforced leather patches on the palm and fingertips. It looks durable and designed for heavy-duty work.

container.howToOpen: The toolbox itself is made of dented steel and has a sturdy, if rusted, latch that needs to be manually lifted.
container.howToStoreItem: The glove can be folded or rolled and placed inside the toolbox.

Workman's Glove.description: This heavy-duty work glove offers protection and grip. Its worn appearance suggests it has seen extensive use, likely in the maintenance or operation of heavy machinery. It might provide protection against sharp edges or extreme temperatures.
Workman's Glove.name: Workman's Glove

Assembly Hall.description: A narrow, metal catwalk snakes from the far end of the assembly line towards a dimly lit doorway.
To your left, a wide, dust-covered conveyor belt stretches into the darkness, disappearing around a corner.

Supervisor's Office.description: The metal catwalk leads back into the main assembly hall, its grated surface a stark contrast to the solid concrete floor.

Sorting Hub.description: The conveyor belt returns you to the main assembly area, its rusted mechanism ominously still.
